class_notes: This section is for InEmory MN semester 4 students only.
course_description: Students will apply concepts and principles of ambulatory care delivery in community settings. They will participate in care coordination and care transition across multiple health delivery systems focusing on nursing knowledge of healthcare reimbursement and quality initiatives.
